entry.tran: 最重要的;显著的;突出的
entry.def: The salient points or facts of a situation are the most important ones.

example.ex: He read the salient facts quickly...
example.tran: 他快速浏览了重要的事实。

example.ex: Chronic fatigue is also one of the salient features of depression.
example.tran: 慢性疲劳也是抑郁症的显著特点之一。

entry.tran: 突出阵线，突出部(战线向敌人阵地推进的狭小范围)
entry.def: A salient is a narrow area where an army has pushed its front line forward into enemy territory.

example.ex: The soldiers had to remain in a deathtrap salient for most of the rest of the war.
example.tran: 随后的战争中，士兵们大部分时间只能呆在最危险的突出阵地里。
